com.cubeia.firebase.api.service.config
Interface ConfigurationProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClusterConfigProviderContract, ServerConfigProviderContract
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClusterConfigProviderContractAdapter, ServerConfigProviderContractAdapter
public interface ConfigurationProvider

A configuration provider is responsible for a set of configuration properties and has the ability to adapt configuration interfaces on top of these properties. Please refer to Configurable for more details on the config mechanism.

Author:
lars.j.nilsson

Method Summary
 ConfigProperty[] getAllProperties()
           
<T extends Configurable>
T
getConfiguration(Class<T> cl, Namespace ns)
           
 

Method Detail

getAllProperties

ConfigProperty[] getAllProperties()
Returns:
Get all properties in the handled configuration, never null

getConfiguration

<T extends Configurable> T getConfiguration(Class<T> cl,
                                            Namespace ns)
                                        throws ConfigurationException
Type Parameters:
T - Generic parameter for a Configurable extension
Parameters:
cl - Actual class of the Configurable to implement, must not be null
ns - Namespace to use for the adaption, may be null
Returns:
An instantiation of the given Configurable, never null
Throws:
ConfigurationException - If the Configurable cannot be adapted
